root.name: Suzukaze no Melt: Where Wishes are Drawn to Each Other
root.description: OverviewSuzukaze no Melt: Where Wishes are Drawn to Each Other is a visual novel developed and published by Whirlpool for the PC. It was later ported to the PlayStation 3 and PlayStation Portable by GN Software under the name Suzukaze no Melt: Days in the Sanctuary. The game has never been released outside of Japan.
